org.opensha2.calc

Class Site.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha2.calc.Site.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Site

    public static class Site.Builder
extends Object
    A reusable Site builder. In the absence of specifying any site characteristics other than location (required), a default Site is returned by build(). Builder instances may be obtained via Site.builder().
    See Also:
    for default values
